about_the_game:
Sproutkin are often regarded as one of the weakest creatures in the land, almost comparable to slugs. Yet one sprout in particular chooses to go on a journey to test its own strength; seeking to kill the god that not even the biggest, most powerful creatures dare approach.

Botanica is a short 2D side-scrolling platformer that puts you in a world of botany and magic. Fight and think your way through platforming and puzzles, and test your combat against a variety of enemies and bosses. Utilize the power of seeds that enemies drop to grow and obtain their own abilities, and uncover secrets abundant in this short adventure. Play through the first world in this demo and encounter your first obstacles!

Included in demo

  • 3 Levels of the first world
  • Platforming and combat
  • The first boss
  • Learn how to use seed abilities
  • A sidequest and secret
